remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

numlitem.para: For lLS approaches to Category 1 minima, the marker beacon system is required if marker position determination is dependent upon its use. For ILS operations, a precision or surveillance radar fix, designated NDB, VOR, DME fix, or a published minimum GSIA fix may be used in lieu of an outer marker.
A middle marker is not required.
Except for Category 2 instrument approach procedures designated as "RA NA" (radar/radio altimeter not authorized), operative radar/radio altimeters may be used in lieu of an inner marker.
Where "RA NA" Standard Instrument Approach Procedure does not prohibit its use, the inner marker may be inoperative provided approach minimums is limited to not less than 1600 RVR.
For lLS approaches to Category 3 minima, the marker beacon system is not required.
Not required if substitutions can be made.

placard.para: Placard near Marker Beacon lights located on P1 panel and P3 panel "MARKER BEACON LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
